name: PUSH (itch) (PineappleLime)
description:
You are a normal delivery man, and you must PUSH the parcels to the houses.

Controls:

WASD to move

X to continue through messages

ENTER or SPACEBAR to start game

R to restart the level

If you would like to see this game get bigger and better, consider leaving a small donation by clicking the button below the game. Thanks.
